Men’s UA Rival Fleece Pants

  • Ultra-soft, mid-weight cotton-blend fleece

item.title: Under Armour Women’s Crossback Mid Impact Sports Bra
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Bras shouldn’t be complicated. They should be comfortable and they should be supportive. So we went straight to the source and asked real women how to make their favorite UA bra even better. And it worked. Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing. Soft, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $17.17
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:21:04 UTC – Details)


Bras shouldn’t be complicated. They should be comfortable and they should be supportive. So we went straight to the source and asked real women how to make their favorite UA bra even better. And it worked. Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing. Soft, quick-drying cups provide extra structure & coverage with perforations for added breathability.Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit. Removable cups have helpful R & L arrows to easily put back in. Crossover straps with updated keyhole detail for easier on/off. Updated interior construction helps keep pads in place—during wear & wash. Elastic band feels super-smooth & soft. Super-smooth, double-layer fabric delivers superior next-to-skin feel. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast & light. 87% Polyester/13% Elastane.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12.4 x 10.16 x 2.44 inches; 3.7 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1361034
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 15, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Under Armour
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09JJYK83D

Imported
Pull-On closure
Machine Wash
Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing
Soft, quick-drying cups provide extra structure & coverage with perforations for added breathability
Crossover straps with updated keyhole detail for easier on/off

Women’s Armour Mid Crossback Sports Bra

Bras shouldn’t be complicated. They should be comfortable and they should be supportive. So we went straight to the source and asked real women how to make their favorite UA bra even better. And it worked.

  • Delivers strategic support, tailored for medium-support activities like cycling, weight training & boxing
  • Soft, quick-drying cups provide extra structure & coverage with perforations for added breathability
  • Removable cups with Right & Left labels
  • Crossover straps with updated keyhole detail for easier on/off
  • Updated interior construction helps keep pads in place—during wear & wash
  • Elastic band feels super-smooth & soft
  • Super-smooth, double-layer HeatGear fabric delivers superior next-to-skin feel
  • Material wicks sweat & dries really fast & light


Read more




Read more

HOW TO MEASURE

BAND SIZE: Standing straight up with an unpadded bra on, measure closely around the chest just under your arms, right above the bust. If your result is a fraction, round to the nearest whole number. (ex. 33.7” rounded to the nearest whole number, your band measurement is 34”)

BUST SIZE: While wearing an unpadded bra, loosely measure around the fullest part of your bust. Round to the nearest whole number. (ex. 34.5” rounded up to the nearest whole number, your bust size is 35”)

CUP SIZE: Subtract your final Band size from your final Bust size to find your Cup Size. (1″ difference = A Cup, 2″ B Cup, 3″ C Cup, 4″ D Cup 5″ DD Cup)

Fit Guide



Read more

4.5

Super-light HeatGear® fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down. Mesh underarm & back panels for strategic ventilation. Ergonomic design keeps seams off high abrasion areas & increases durability. Hybrid raglan sleeve construction for added range of motion & comfort. Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit. Body: 84% Polyester/16% Elastane. Mesh: 92% Polyester/8% Elastane.Fit & Care:
Machine wash cold with like colors
Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed
Tumble dry low
Do not iron.
Do not use softeners.
Do not dry clean.

Under Armour Men’s HeatGear Compression Long-Sleeve

HeatGear Armour is our original performance baselayer—the one you put on first and take off last. So we made it extra comfortable by wicking sweat and stretching so you can move no matter what.

  • Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit.
  • Super-light HeatGear fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down
  • Mesh underarm & back panels for strategic ventilation
  • Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
  • Ergonomic design keeps seams off high abrasion areas & increases durability
  • Hybrid raglan sleeve construction for added range of motion & comfort

item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Ergonomic Benefits

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you’re at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

HUANUO Foot Rest

Enjoy the feeling of relaxation at any time.

HUANUO Hot New Releases

HUANUO Office Chair&Organizer

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.4 x 13.27 x 4.41 inches; 4.63 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ HNFR3
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HUANUO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07L3RVF7C
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Adjustable Height – Height is manually adjustable to 3 different positions: 4.3″ , 5.5 “, 6.7” (11cm/14 cm/17cm). Super easy for you to find the perfect position to suit your needs
Easy Angle Adjustment – Tilts -30°- +30°to support your legs at your preferred angle. The Angle can’t be fixed, it rocks back and forth which encourages leg movement
Massage Textured Surface – Comes with a large non-skid surface (18″ X 13″), free-floating platform texture made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. Perfect for office and home use
Pre-Assembled For Use- This adjustable foot rest is pre-assembled for immediate use. Non slip feet enhances overall stability. Sturdy construction offer you comfortable experience while you’re working or studying

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you're at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

Ergonomic Benefits

Great foot rest for working at a computer. Comes with the adjustability for your desired height. Features a free-floating platform that tilts back and forth which encourages full leg stretches and lower-leg movement, and helps minimize fatigue and increase circulation, which is important when sitting for long periods of time.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. It supports better posture and reduces physical stress. Being completely adjustable to multiple tilt angles and height settings. It allows you to find what is just right for you to relax comfortably.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Adjustable Heights

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Textured Surface

This foot rest comes with a textured surface made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. When barefoot or wearing socks, the uneven surface creates a massaging effect on the soles of feet. Simply move your feet in any direction over the bumpy surface.

Read more

Fully Assembled

Flat design for easy storage. Comes fully assembled which makes it ready for immediate use out of box. Non slip feet enhance stress reduction and overall stability.

Read more

Under Desk Foot Rest - Ergonomic Footrest

FITS YOUR FEET PERFECTLY WITH WEDGE SHAPE – Measured as 17 x 10 x 7 inches, it is large enough to meet most people’s needs. Designed as a wedge shaped foot stool cushion.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN – This foot rest for under desk at work can provide you with comfortable & firm support on for your feet & knees
SKIN-FRIENDLY FIBER FABRIC COVER – Made of soft & breathable fiber fabric cover, our office under desk footrest is skin-friendly to put your bare feet on, providing you with a comfortable feel and helping keep your feet from sweating
MULTI-PURPOSE FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS – If you turn the foot stool over and put your feet on it, this can become a rocker to move your feet.You can also put the adjustable foot rest under your leg & back to help provide you with great support

Magic Tape for Adjusting Heights

Designed as an adjustable office foot rest, you could add or remove the additional cushion by using the magic tape as needed to get a suitable height.

Non-slip Bottom

Comes with the non-slip bottom. This foot rest pillow can be fixed in place to give you a more relaxing experience.

Smooth Zipper to Easily Remove Cover

Comes with the smooth zipper. The foot rest cushion cover is easy to remove for machine washing.

Soft Fiber Fabric Cover

Made of fiber. This fabric cover foot rest pad is skin-friendly to put your bare feet on, providing you with a comfortable experience.

Read more

Ergonomically designed with a wedge-shape, our foot rest pad can fit your foot shape perfectly, so you can enjoy a relaxed work & entertainment environment.

Comes with our magic tape. The foot rest cushion can also be adjusted to 2 heights of 5 inches and 7 inches to provide you with the most comfortable & firm support, suitable for every scenario and most people.
